comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
Best that I can tell, Termux does two things:

1. terminal for Android - you should be able to use this to ssh to another machine and run PowerShell
2. Linux environment based on Debian/Ubuntu for Android - perhaps you can try the generic linux.tar.gz pkg we build and see if it works?

comments.author: myfreess
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT  thanks！Is Powershell for linux a GUI program?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @myfreess no, PowerShell is a shell and thus works in the console

comments.author: DRSDavidSoft
comments.body:
If anyone's interested, this is indeed possible:

https://github.com/termux/termux-packages/issues/1729
